description:
From 4-wheels to 2, this sturdy bike will introduce your little rider to the joys of cycling. The Trail 16” is worthy of the honor of being their first pedal bike. Made from the same strong aluminum as the adult bikes, this little bike is big on safety. The included training wheels are easy to pop on and off, should your new rider want a bit more practice, or their younger sibling wants to try. Grippy tires and a powerful rear brake offer confidence inspiring control.

  • SmartForm C3 alloy frame, with stable geometry designed for growing kids
  • Tool-free training wheels make the transition to 2-wheels easy
  • Rear brakes have plenty of stopping power
  • Internal cable routing keeps things safe and clean
  • Chain guard helps protect favourite outfits from grease
  • Innova tires grip well on trails and pavement
  • Smooth rolling wheels
  • Kickstand mount (kickstand not included)
  • Designed for kids 4-6 years old
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for a year after purchase
name: Cannondale Trail 16" Bicycle - Children to Youths
